pull.title: [28.x] 28.2rc2
pull.body:
Backports #32568.
Bumps to `rc2`.
#32563 & #32639 haved landed since `rc1`.

verification.payload:
tree ca9046a23ef20df645f209ad0c2e47396eb04431
parent 7f1da762692398740b33bdf1124ded417a986c4b
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1747734306 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1749130996 +0200

depends: use "mkdir -p" when installing xproto

It looks like the mkdir detection in xproto is broken on Alpine. Ensure
we always use `mkdir -p`.

Fixes #32494.

Github-Pull: #32568
Rebased-From: df9ebbf659d5d1282289f36d7f9ee7103aa33a17

events.message:
depends: use "mkdir -p" when installing xproto

It looks like the mkdir detection in xproto is broken on Alpine. Ensure
we always use `mkdir -p`.

Fixes #32494.

Github-Pull: #32568
Rebased-From: df9ebbf659d5d1282289f36d7f9ee7103aa33a17
